Variable.name: freediskspacemb
Variable.expression: ceiling(Data[@name='bytesPerSector'] * Data[@name='sectorsPerCluster'] * Data[@name='numberOfFreeClusters'] div number('1024') div number('1024'))

StringTable.String: Running

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailCheckWorkstationServiceAbnormallyStopped

StringTable.String: The Workstation service has stopped abnormally.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailCheckWorkstationServiceAbnormallyStopped

StringTable.String: Application Error. Exit code {exitcode}.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailCheckWorkstationServiceAbnormallyStopped

StringTable.String: Restart the service
System Diagnosis

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailServiceNotFound

StringTable.String: Service {servicename} not found in system services.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailServiceNotFound

StringTable.String: Service not registered with system.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailServiceNotFound

StringTable.String: Register service with system.
System Diagnosis

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailOSVersionCheck

StringTable.String: This computer has failed the Operating System version check

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailOSVersionCheck

StringTable.String: This diagnostic was written for a different version of the Operating System. Elements in this report may be invalid.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailOSVersionCheck

StringTable.String: OS Version string does not contain 6.1

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailOSVersionCheck

StringTable.String: Verify the Operating System by running winver.exe.
Operating System version

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailOSAddressWidthCheck

StringTable.String: This computer has failed the Operating System architecture check

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailOSAddressWidthCheck

StringTable.String: The architecture for the installed Operating System is not recommended for this hardware

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailOSAddressWidthCheck

StringTable.String: The Operating System architecture is {osarchitecture} whereas the Processor address width is {processorwidth} bit.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailOSAddressWidthCheck

StringTable.String: Consider reinstalling a {processorwidth} bit Operating System for greater performance
Hardware Compatibility

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailLogicalDiskDirty

StringTable.String: The VolumeDirty flag is set on the disk

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailLogicalDiskDirty

StringTable.String: A logical disk has the dirty bit set.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailLogicalDiskDirty

StringTable.String: This disk has been marked as dirty, it may be experiencing errors or might have not been shut down correctly

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailLogicalDiskDirty

StringTable.String: 1. Run chkdsk on the drive and document any errors identified.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailLogicalDiskDirty

StringTable.String: 2. If chkdsk determines that there are errors on the drive run chkdsk /f to repair the errors.
Disk Diagnosis

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailService

StringTable.String: A service is reported as having an unexpected error code

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailService

StringTable.String: One or more services has failed. The service did not stop gracefully, suggesting the service may have crashed or one of its components stopped in an unsupported way.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailService

StringTable.String: Service exited with code not equal to 0 or 1077

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailService

StringTable.String: Restart the service
Performance Diagnosis

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailSMARTCheck

StringTable.String: The PredictFailure flag is set on the disk

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailSMARTCheck

StringTable.String: A logical disk has the SMART Predict Failure bit set.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailSMARTCheck

StringTable.String: This disk is experiencing a problem and predicts that the drive will fail.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailSMARTCheck

StringTable.String: 1. Back up any critical data on this drive.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailSMARTCheck

StringTable.String: 2. After backing up your data you can attempt to run chkdsk /f to repair minor errors. Do not run chkdsk /f on the drive unless the data has been backed up. Data loss may occur if the drive is experiencing physical failure.
Disk Diagnosis

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: {diskname} has less than {minfreediskpercent}% free disk space

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: A logical disk has a low amount of free disk space.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: {diskname} has {freediskspacemb} MB free disk space. There is {freediskpercent}% free. Low disk space may cause poor performance and low virtual memory errors

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: 1. Verify disk space is low by viewing the drive using "Computer" from the Start menu.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: 2. Back up non-critical files and then remove them from the drive.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: 3. Perform a disk cleanup.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailSystemDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: {diskname} has less than {minfreediskpercent}% free or less than {minfreediskspacemb} MB disk space

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailSystemDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: The main system disk is low on space.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailSystemDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: {diskname} has {freediskspacemb} MB of free disk space. There is {freediskpercent}% free.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailSystemDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: 1. Verify disk space is low by viewing the drive in using "Computer" from the Start menu.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailSystemDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: 2. Back up non-critical files and then remove them from the drive.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailSystemDiskSpaceFree

StringTable.String: 3. Perform a disk cleanup.
Free up disk space

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailLUA

StringTable.String: The Security Center reports that User Access Control is disabled.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailLUA

StringTable.String: User Access Control is disabled. It is highly recommended that you run Windows with User Access Control enabled.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailLUA

StringTable.String: Enable User Access Control using the Security Center.
User Acess Control

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailWU

StringTable.String: The Security Center reports that Windows Update is disabled.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailWU

StringTable.String: Windows Update is disabled. It is highly recommended that you run Windows with Windows Update enabled.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailWU

StringTable.String: 1. Enable Windows Update in the Security Center.
Windows Update

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: The Security Center reports that there is no anti-virus product actively protecting this system.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: The Security Center has reported that on-access virus scanning is disabled. Either on-access scanning is disabled, or the anti-virus application is not recognized.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: Verify that an anti-virus product is installed.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusUnknown

StringTable.String: The Security Center has not recorded an anti-virus product.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusUnknown

StringTable.String: The Security Center is unable to identify an active anti-virus application. Either there is no anti-virus product installed or it is not recognized.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusUnknown

StringTable.String: 1. Verify that an anti-virus product is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusUnknown

StringTable.String: 2. If an anti-virus product is installed and functioning configure Security Center to stop monitoring anti-virus status.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: The Security Center has recorded that the anti-virus product: {antivirusproduct} is not up-to-date.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: {antivirusproduct} is not up-to-date. It is highly recommended that you run Windows with an anti-virus product that is as up-to-date as possible.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: Anti-virus product registered with the Security Center reports that it is not up-to-date.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiVirusCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: Refer to the product documentation or manufacturer of {antivirusproduct} for information on how to get up-to-date.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareUnknown

StringTable.String: The Security Center has not recorded an anti-spyware product.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareUnknown

StringTable.String: The Security Center is unable to identify an active anti-spyware application. Either there is no anti-spyware product installed, or it is not recognized.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareUnknown

StringTable.String: 1. Verify that an anti-spyware product is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareUnknown

StringTable.String: 2. If an anti-spyware product is installed and functioning configure Security Center to stop monitoring anti-spyware status.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: The Security Center reports that there is no anti-spyware product actively protecting this system.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: The Security Center has reported that on-access spyware scanning is disabled. Either on-access scanning is disabled, or the anti-spyware application is not recognized.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: 1. Verify that an anti-spyware product is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckEnabled

StringTable.String: 2. If an anti-spyware product is installed and functioning configure Security Center to stop monitoring anti-spyware status.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: The Security Center has recorded that the anti-spyware product: {antispywareproduct} is not up-to-date.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: {antispywareproduct} is not up-to-date. It is highly recommended that you run Windows with an anti-spyware product that is as up-to-date as possible.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: The Anti-spyware product registered with the Security Center reports that it is not up-to-date.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailAntiSpywareCheckUpToDate

StringTable.String: Refer to the product documentation or manufacturer of {antispywareproduct} for information on how to get up-to-date.

String.loc.comment: Symptom string for warning message: WarnFailFirewallEnabled

StringTable.String: The Security Center reports that there is no firewall product actively protecting this system.

String.loc.comment: Cause string for warning message: WarnFailFirewallEnabled

StringTable.String: A firewall product is not enabled on this system. It is highly recommended you run Windows with one enabled firewall product.

String.loc.comment: Details string for warning message: WarnFailFirewallEnabled

StringTable.String: No Firewall products registered with the Security Center reports that it is enabled.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailFirewallEnabled

StringTable.String: 1. Verify that a firewall product is installed.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailFirewallEnabled

StringTable.String: 2. If you are using a 3rd party firewall that does not register with the Security Center you can configure Security Center not to monitor this setting.

String.loc.comment: Resolution string for warning message: WarnFailFirewallEnabled

StringTable.String: 3. If you do not have a firewall product installed you should enable the Windows Firewall.
Anti-spyware
Anti-virus
Firewall
Performance Diagnosis

String.loc.comment: Name of PLA rules group

StringTable.String: WMI Performance Queries

String.loc.comment: Name of rule that inserts performance sections and tables seen in WPDC

StringTable.String: Insert Configuration table into final report

String.loc.comment: Name of rule that lists all the interactive processes seen in WPDC

StringTable.String: Create table of interactive session processes

String.loc.comment: Name of rule that lists all the startup programs seen in WPDC

StringTable.String: Startup Programs

String.loc.comment: Name of rule that removes all the unwanted performance tables seen in WPDC

StringTable.String: Cleanup unwanted performance tables

String.loc.comment: Name of rule that summarizes the desktop rating seen in WPDC

StringTable.String: Desktop Rating

String.loc.comment: Informational warning for poor CPU score seen in report

StringTable.String: The "CPU" rating for the system is poor and may be the cause of performance problems. Reducing the number of open applications may improve system performance. Check for unnecessary startup applications and disable those that are not required. If the problem continues the CPU may need to be upgraded.

String.loc.comment: Informational warning for poor D3D score seen in report

StringTable.String: The "Gaming graphics" rating for the system is poor and may be the cause of performance problems in multimedia applications or games. Disabling Aero Glass may improve performance in multimedia applications or games. If the problem continues the display adapter may need an updated driver or may need to be upgraded.

String.loc.comment: Informational warning for poor Graphics score seen in report

StringTable.String: The "Graphics" rating for the system is poor and may be the cause of performance problems. Disabling Desktop Composition or reducing screen resolution may improve graphical performance. If the problem continues the display adapter may need an updated driver or may need to be upgraded.

String.loc.comment: Informational warning for poor Disk score seen in report

StringTable.String: The "Disk" rating for the system is poor and may be the cause of performance problems. Reducing the number of open applications may improve system performance. Ensure the disk has adequate free space and is defragmented. Check for unnecessary startup applications and disable those that are not required. If the problem continues the disk may need to be upgraded.

String.loc.comment: Informational warning for poor Memory score seen in report

StringTable.String: The "Memory" rating for the system is very poor and may be the cause for performance issues. Reducing the number of open applications may improve system performance. Check for unnecessary startup applications and disable those that are not required. If the problem continues the memory may need to be upgraded.

String.loc.comment: Informational warning for multiple logged on users seen in report

StringTable.String: Multiple users are logged on to the machine and this may be the cause of performance problems. Log off any inactive users to reclaim system resources.
Performance Diagnosis
